snippet: At an event in Utah, Gov. Chris Christie got a standing ovation from members of the Republican establishment, some of whom last year criticized Mr. Christie’s lavish praise and embrace of President Obama after Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Gov Chris Christie of New Jersey, appearing at Republican event in Utah, receives standing ovation from members of conservative establishment who had once harshly criticized his praise and embrace of Pres Obama following Hurricane Sandy; response indicates that bitterness toward Christie is fading among power brokers who could potentially finance his run for president in 2016.
lead_paragraph: At an event in Utah, Gov. Chris Christie got a standing ovation from members of the Republican establishment, some of whom last year criticized Mr. Christie’s lavish praise and embrace of President Obama after Hurricane Sandy.

headline.seo: Christie, at G.O.P. Gathering, Finds Many Unburned Bridges After Obama Hug
headline.main: Christie, at G.O.P. Event, Finds Many Unburned Bridges
headline.print_headline: Christie, at G.O.P. Event, Finds Many Unburned Bridges
